recipe.label: Hong Shao Rou (红烧肉) - Red Braised Pork
ingredientLines: 500 gram pork belly, cut into bite size cubes

3 scallions, cut into 1 inch sections, divided
2 tablespoon brown rock sugar (or use golden/light brown sugar)
